subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
Text Messaging
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire mostly skirted around questions about reportedly sending Carmelo Anthony a text message that he wanted him as a teammate and to resist the Nets’ overtures.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire mostly skirted around questions about reportedly sending Carmelo Anthony a text message that he wanted him as a teammate and to resist the Nets’ overtures.
